Proceeds the position. Returns false if the cancel button has been clicked.

Parameters:
at The current value of the progress
virtual void sxsdk::progress_dialog_interface::set_range ( int  start,
int  end,
void *  aux = 0 
) [virtual]

Sets the range.

Regardless of the set value, in the dialog display, the start value is 0% and the end value is 100%.

Parameters:
start the start value
end the end value
virtual void sxsdk::progress_dialog_interface::step ( int  step = 1,
void *  aux = 0 
) [virtual]

Proceeds the position. Checks if the cancel button has been clicked, and if so, throws an exception.

Each time called, the current progress value increasing by step, and the progress bar closes once the value set by set_range() is reached.

Parameters:
step the step size
virtual bool sxsdk::progress_dialog_interface::step_nothrow ( int  by = 1  )  [virtual]

Proceeds the position. Returns false if the cancel button has been clicked.

Each time called, the current progress value increasing by step, and the progress bar closes once the value set by set_range() is reached.

Parameters:
by the step size
